articles.author: Thomas Claburn
articles.title: EU-turn! Now Apple says it won't banish Home Screen web apps in Europe - The Register
articles.description: So, er, how will WebKit-only applications work under latest Euro antitrust laws? Anyone? Tim?
articles.content:
Apple has reversed its decision to limit the functionality of Home Screen web apps in Europe following an outcry from the developer community and the prospect of further investigation.
"We have rece… [+5469 chars]
